parameters.name: CdnType
parameters.description:
The workload type of the accelerated domain name. Valid values:

*   **web**: images and small files
*   **download**: large files
*   **video**: on-demand video and audio streaming

parameters.name: CheckUrl
parameters.description: The URL that is used to check the accessibility of the origin server.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The domain name that you want to add to Alibaba Cloud CDN.

A wildcard domain that starts with a period (.) is supported, such as .example.com.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group.

If you do not set this parameter, the system uses the ID of the default resource group.

parameters.name: Scope
parameters.description:
The acceleration region. Default value: domestic. Valid values:

*   **domestic**: Chinese mainland
*   **overseas**: global (excluding the Chinese mainland)
*   **global**: global

parameters.name: Sources
parameters.description: The information about the addresses of origin servers.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: Details about the tags. You can specify up to 20 tags.
